name: 摩美々
text:
そういえばぁ
ホラーの撮影、どうだったのー？
trans: That reminds me... How did the drama shoot this morning go?

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、確かに
私もそれは気になっていたんだ
trans: Oh, yes. I'm quite curious to know the details as well.

name: 咲耶
text: ぜひ聞かせてほしいな
trans: Please, do tell.

name: 結華
text: ……聞いちゃうんだね、ふたりとも……
trans: I'll tell you what happened, but...

name: 結華
text:
どんな話が出てきても……
驚かない覚悟、できてる……？
trans: Can you both promise that no matter what I say... You won't freak out?

name: 恋鐘
text:
も～結華！
そがん変にしゃべるとはよくなか！
trans: Oh c'mon, Yuika! Don' start talkin' all weird!

name: 結華
text: あはは、やっぱ怒られちゃったか
trans: Ahahah, I figured you wouldn't like that.

name: 咲耶
text: 結華……？
trans: Yuika...?

name: 結華
text:
ごめんねさくやん
なんの滞りもなく進行したのでした！
trans: I'm sorry, Sakuyan! Anyway, it went well! No issues at all!

name: 結華
text:
スタジオの廊下で、たまたま幽霊役の人とかち合った
こがたんがすごく驚いてたなぁとか
trans: In the studio hallway there were people dressed up as ghosts who'd pop out and try to scare us. Kogatan screamed the whole time. That kinda thing.

name: 結華
text:
差し入れのお菓子もホラー仕様だったから、
こがたんそれにも驚いてたなぁってぐらいで……
trans: After the shoot they brought us snacks shaped like ghosts for refreshments, and Kogatan even got freaked by those...

name: 恋鐘
text: なんでうちのことばっかり言うと！？
trans: Why're ya only talkin' about what I did!?

name: 結華
text: そりゃあ、一番印象に残ってるから……
trans: Well, your reactions were what left the biggest impression...

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
うん……
trans: Eheh... Yes...

name: 霧子
text:
怖い……
お話だったけど……
trans: The drama... was a scary story.

name: 霧子
text:
ずっと……
楽しかったよ……
trans: But the whole time... I was having so much fun.

name: 摩美々
text: なぁんだ、残念ー
trans: Well isn't that a shame.

name: 摩美々
text:
そういうとこって
集まりやすいって聞いたのにー
trans: Considering I've heard that studio is haunted.

name: 恋鐘
text: ふえっ！？
trans: Hweh!?

name: 摩美々
text:
っていうかぁ
スタジオって大体出るって言うじゃんー？
trans: There's been a lot of ghost sightings there, haven't you heard?

name: 恋鐘
trans: H-Hweh!?

name: 摩美々
text: 今日だって、ほらぁ──
trans: Maybe what you saw in the shoot were–

name: 霧子
text: 摩美々ちゃん……！
trans: Mamimi!

name: 結華
text:
はーいまみみん、こがたんが身動き取れなくなっちゃうから
それ以上はダメー
trans: That's enough, Mamimin. Kogatan is probably gonna pass out if you keep going. Knock it off.

name: 摩美々
text: えー
trans: Boo.

name: 結華
text: きりりんも心配してるでしょ
trans: Look, you're making Kiririn worry too.

name: 結華
text: ご期待にそえなくて申し訳ありませんが！
trans: While I do apologize that our experience didn't meet your expectations!

name: 結華
text:
三峰たちは本当のホラー体験はしてないし、
今日のスタジオでもするつもりはありません！
trans: The three of us have never encountered any actual ghosts, and we didn't see any during today's shoot either!

name: 結華
text: ねっ、こがたん！　きりりん！
trans: Right, Kogatan! Kiririn!

name: 恋鐘
text: そ、その通りたい！
trans: T-that's right!

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yes...!

name: 摩美々
text:
あーあ
ざぁんねーん
trans: Well, that's just too bad.

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ
さて、そんな摩美々に朗報だ
trans: Heh. How about this then, Mamimi.

name: 咲耶
text:
本当のホラー体験はできなくても
私たちにはまだ手が残されている
trans: While it won't be the same as real ghosts, there's still something spooky we could do.

name: 摩美々
text:
……ドラマを見ればいいって
言うんでしょー
trans: ...You're saying we should watch the drama they were in, right?

name: 咲耶
text: おや、摩美々にはお見通しなんだね
trans: Ah, it's as if you read my mind, Mamimi.

name: 咲耶
text:
どうかな？
今日の分は、放送日のお楽しみということで
trans: What do you think? We can look forward to seeing what they shot today when it airs.

name: 摩美々
text: ……悪くはないよねー
trans: Sounds pretty good.

name: 摩美々
text:
録画しておけば、
みんなの怖がった顔が保存できるしー
trans: And if I record it, I can have everyone's terrified faces preserved on my TV forever.

name: 結華
text: やめてよー、そんな弱みみたいに扱うのー
trans: Oh hush, just how weak do you think we were?

name: 摩美々
text: ふふー、どうしようかなぁ
trans: Fufu, I guess we're gonna find out.

name: 咲耶
text:
怖がっているみんなを見るというのは
とても胸が痛むのだけれど……
trans: Although it will hurt my heart deeply to watch the three of you in peril......

name: 咲耶
text:
３人の挑戦を見せてもらえるという点では
とても楽しみに思っているんだ
trans: I am really looking forward to seeing the fruits of your hard work.

name: 恋鐘
text: うちも！
trans: Me too!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ひとりで見るとは……
ちょっと怖かかもしれんけど～……
trans: Though, watchin' it on my own... Might be a bit too scary...

name: 霧子
text: それじゃあ……
trans: Then...

name: 霧子
text:
今度は……
みんなで……
trans: When it airs... Let's watch it together.

name: 結華
trans: Ah!

name: 結華
text:
じゃあそれならさ！
提案！
trans: Oh hey, in that case! How about this!

name: 結華
text: よかったら当日は、うちで──
trans: If it's cool with everyone, why don't we watch it at my place──
